keyMoments.title: Doflamingo Mentions SMILEs
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo reveals the organization is moving away from the slave trade to focus on 'SMILEs,' which are the future.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows the Donquixote Pirates' involvement in the artificial Devil Fruit business that becomes central to future arcs.

keyMoments.title: Abandons Human Auctioning House
keyMoments.description: Under Doflamingo's orders, the Donquixote Pirates withdraw from the slave trade business entirely.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the organization's shift in business strategy from traditional crime to the SMILE trade.

statusHistory.description: Operating as Warlord crew and criminal organization

reveals.information: The Donquixote Pirates are transitioning from slave trading to a new venture involving 'SMILEs'

keyMoments.title: Dispatch Admiral Kizaru to Sabaody
keyMoments.description: Fleet Admiral Sengoku orders Admiral Kizaru to go to Sabaody Archipelago to respond to the attack on a Celestial Dragon.
keyMoments.significance: This deployment will lead to the catastrophic separation of the Straw Hat crew and the two-year time skip.

keyMoments.title: Marines Besiege the Auction House
keyMoments.description: A large Marine force surrounds the Human Auctioning House with artillery and demands the surrender of the Supernovas.
keyMoments.significance: The Marines engage in their first major confrontation with multiple members of the Worst Generation simultaneously.

reveals.information: When a Celestial Dragon is attacked, the Marines immediately dispatch an Admiral to deal with the situation

keyMoments.title: Luffy Stands with Kid and Law
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates' captain stands alongside two other Supernova captains to face the Marine siege.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Straw Hats working alongside rival crews against a common enemy.

statusHistory.description: Active pirate crew on their journey through Paradise

keyMoments.title: Kid Displays Magnetic Powers
keyMoments.description: Captain Eustass Kid demonstrates his Devil Fruit abilities for the first time against the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the Kid Pirates' captain possesses powerful magnetic abilities.

keyMoments.title: Kid Stands with Luffy and Law
keyMoments.description: The Kid Pirates' captain temporarily allies with two other Supernova captains against the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Kid Pirates working alongside rival crews.

statusHistory.description: Active Supernova crew at Sabaody Archipelago

reveals.information: The Kid Pirates' captain possesses a Devil Fruit that grants magnetic powers

keyMoments.title: Law Demonstrates 'Room' Ability
keyMoments.description: Captain Trafalgar Law displays his Devil Fruit powers for the first time, creating a 'Room' and performing surgical manipulations.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the Heart Pirates' captain possesses terrifying surgical abilities.

keyMoments.title: Law Stands with Luffy and Kid
keyMoments.description: The Heart Pirates' captain temporarily allies with two other Supernova captains against the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows future alliance between Law and Luffy.

statusHistory.description: Active Supernova crew at Sabaody Archipelago

reveals.information: The Heart Pirates' captain possesses the Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit with surgical abilities
